basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Front-end Developer | React • Redux • TypeScript
basics.summary: Experienced Front-end Developer with 3+ years of experience building and optimizing interactive, user-centric web applications. Proficient in React, Redux, and TypeScript, with a strong background in creating responsive layouts, consuming REST APIs, and collaborating with UI/UX teams. Proven ability to improve application performance and deliver high-quality code in fast-paced environments.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend initiatives focused on performance, user experience, and modern development practices in a collaborative environment.
highlights: Led a complete frontend migration, improving page load times by over 25% and enhancing overall user experience.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate requirements into responsive, cross-browser compatible web applications.
Implemented unit and integration tests using Jest to ensure code quality and application stability.
Engineered a production Chrome extension using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time in-browser analysis.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Contributed to the development of a customer-facing landing page and dashboard, focusing on UI implementation and API integration.
highlights: Developed core UI components and multi-step workflows using Nuxt.js (Vue 3) and TypeScript.
Ensured a consistent user experience by implementing responsive designs and guaranteeing cross-browser compatibility.
Integrated frontend components with backend REST APIs, working with the backend team to define and refine data contracts.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing internal tools to automate workflows and improve team productivity.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide Innovation Contest for 'Otis,' a JavaScript-based automation tool that significantly improved team efficiency.
Automated repetitive data entry and email generation tasks using JavaScript, jQuery, and Regular Expressions.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for creating 'Otis,' an automation tool that streamlined templating and email workflows, significantly boosting team productivity.

projects.name: IT-Hub – MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Developed a full-stack social media application to demonstrate proficiency in the MERN stack, with a focus on modern React frontend architecture.
highlights: Implemented a responsive frontend using React, employing component-based architecture for modularity and reusability.
Managed application state globally using Redux, handling user authentication, posts, and user interaction data.
Built and connected to a backend with Node.js/Express.js, creating RESTful API endpoints for all frontend functionalities.
